results.title: An Abortion Ban With Unexpected Consequences for Older Mothers
results.abstract: Older women are more likely to carry fetuses with genetic disorders that often can’t be detected until 15 weeks of pregnancy, beyond the limit set in a Senate proposal.

results.title: Two Russians who braved miles of open sea arrive on an Alaskan island and request asylum.
results.abstract: The men, apparently part of an exodus of more than 200,000 since Putin announced a new draft, traveled on a vessel from Russia and reached St. Lawrence Island in the Bering Sea.

media.caption: The town of Gambell on St. Lawrence Island in Alaska. Two Russians who fled from eastern Russia landed near the town on Tuesday and requested asylum, according to two U.S. senators.
